title: Confession
verses: 1 John 1:9 (WEB) — “If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive… and to cleanse.”
Proverbs 28:13 (WEB) — “He who conceals his sins doesn’t prosper, but whoever confesses and renounces them finds mercy.”
Psalm 32:5 (WEB) — “I acknowledged my sin… and you forgave the iniquity of my sin.”
James 5:16 (WEB) — “Confess your sins to one another, and pray… that you may be healed.”
body: Bring sin into the light quickly. Agree with God, turn from it, and receive full forgiveness through Jesus. Walk with trusted believers for healing and new habits of holiness.
prayer: Merciful Lord, I confess my sin and turn to You. Wash me, renew me, and lead me in paths of righteousness for Your name’s sake. Amen.
